1: ה֤וֹי <sup>1945 </sup> <n>Ho</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>Every</n> צָמֵא֙ <sup>6771 </sup> <n>every one that thirsteth</n> לְכ֣וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>come</n> לַמַּ֔יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>ye to the waters</n> וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>have</n> ל֖וֹ כָּ֑סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>and he that hath no money</n> לְכ֤וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>come</n> שִׁבְרוּ֙ <sup>7666 </sup> <n>ye buy</n> וֶֽאֱכֹ֔לוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and eat</n> וּלְכ֣וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>Come</n> שִׁבְר֗וּ <sup>7666 </sup> <n>buy</n> בְּלוֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Without</n> כֶ֛סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>without money</n> וּבְל֥וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and without</n> מְחִ֖יר <sup>4242 </sup> <n>and without price</n> יַ֥יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>wine</n> וְחָלָֽב׃ <sup>2461 </sup> <n>and milk</n>
2: לָ֤מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> תִשְׁקְלוּ־ <sup>8254 </sup> <n>Wherefore do ye spend</n> כֶ֙סֶף֙ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> בְּֽלוֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> לֶ֔חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>bread</n> וִיגִיעֲכֶ֖ם <sup>3018 </sup> <n>and your wages</n> בְּל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>for</n> לְשָׂבְעָ֑ה <sup>7654 </sup> <n>for [that which] satisfieth</n> שִׁמְע֨וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>diligently</n> שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>carefully</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> וְאִכְלוּ־ <sup>398 </sup> <n>unto me and eat</n> ט֔וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>ye [that which is] good</n> וְתִתְעַנַּ֥ג <sup>6026 </sup> <n>delight</n> בַּדֶּ֖שֶׁן <sup>1880 </sup> <n>itself in fatness</n> נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and let your soul</n>
3: הַטּ֤וּ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>Incline</n> אָזְנְכֶם֙ <sup>241 </sup> <n>your ear</n> וּלְכ֣וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and come</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> שִׁמְע֖וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto me hear</n> וּתְחִ֣י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>shall live</n> נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>and your soul</n> וְאֶכְרְתָ֤ה <sup>3772 </sup> <n>and I will make</n> לָכֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>covenant</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>an everlasting</n> חַֽסְדֵ֥י <sup>2617 </sup> <n>mercies</n> דָוִ֖ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> הַנֶּאֱמָנִֽים׃ <sup>539 </sup> <n>with you [even] the sure</n>
4: הֵ֛ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עֵ֥ד <sup>5707 </sup> <n>him [for] a witness</n> לְאוּמִּ֖ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>to the people</n> נְתַתִּ֑יו <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Behold I have given</n> נָגִ֥יד <sup>5057 </sup> <n>a leader</n> וּמְצַוֵּ֖ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>and commander</n> לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <sup>3816 </sup> <n>to the people</n>
5: הֵ֣ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> גּ֤וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>a nation</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵדַע֙ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[that] thou knowest</n> תִּקְרָ֔א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>Behold thou shalt call</n> וְג֥וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>not and nations</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יְדָע֖וּךָ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[that] knew</n> אֵלֶ֣יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יָר֑וּצוּ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>not thee shall run</n> לְמַ֙עַן֙ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>Because</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto thee because of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְלִקְד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>and for the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> פֵאֲרָֽךְ׃ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>for he hath glorified</n> ס
6: דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>Seek</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n> בְּהִמָּצְא֑וֹ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>while he may be found</n> קְרָאֻ֖הוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>call</n> בִּֽהְיוֹת֥וֹ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> קָרֽוֹב׃ <sup>7138 </sup> <n>ye upon him while he is near</n>
7: יַעֲזֹ֤ב <sup>5800 </sup> <n>forsake</n> רָשָׁע֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>Let the wicked</n> דַּרְכּ֔וֹ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>his way</n> וְאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אָ֖וֶן <sup>205 </sup> <n>and the unrighteous</n> מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֑יו <sup>4284 </sup> <n>his thoughts</n> וְיָשֹׁ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and let him return</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וִֽירַחֲמֵ֔הוּ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>and he will have mercy</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <sup>430 </sup> <n>upon him and to our God</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יַרְבֶּ֥ה <sup>7235 </sup> <n>for he will abundantly</n> לִסְלֽוֹחַ׃ <sup>5545 </sup> <n>pardon</n>
8: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> מַחְשְׁבוֹתַי֙ <sup>4284 </sup> <n>For my thoughts</n> מַחְשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>4284 </sup> <n>[are] not your thoughts</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>neither [are] your ways</n> דְּרָכָ֑י <sup>1870 </sup> <n>my ways</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גָבְה֥וּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>are higher</n> שָׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>For [as] the heavens</n> מֵאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>than the earth</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> גָּבְה֤וּ <sup>1361 </sup> <n>higher</n> דְרָכַי֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>so are my ways</n> מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>than your ways</n> וּמַחְשְׁבֹתַ֖י <sup>4284 </sup> <n>and my thoughts</n> מִמַּחְשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>4284 </sup> <n>than your thoughts</n>
10: כִּ֡י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> יֵרֵד֩ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>cometh down</n> הַגֶּ֨שֶׁם <sup>1653 </sup> <n>For as the rain</n> וְהַשֶּׁ֜לֶג <sup>7950 </sup> <n>and the snow</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>from heaven</n> וְשָׁ֙מָּה֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָשׁ֔וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and returneth</n> כִּ֚י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> הִרְוָ֣ה <sup>7301 </sup> <n>not thither but watereth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וְהוֹלִידָ֖הּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and maketh it bring forth</n> וְהִצְמִיחָ֑הּ <sup>6779 </sup> <n>and bud</n> וְנָ֤תַן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that it may give</n> זֶ֙רַע֙ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>seed</n> לַזֹּרֵ֔עַ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>to the sower</n> וְלֶ֖חֶם <sup>3899 </sup> <n>and bread</n> לָאֹכֵֽל׃ <sup>398 </sup> <n>to the eater</n>
11: כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>So</n> יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> דְבָרִי֙ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>So shall my word</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>be which</n> יֵצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>be that goeth forth</n> מִפִּ֔י <sup>6310 </sup> <n>out of my mouth</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>It will not</n> יָשׁ֥וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>it shall not return</n> אֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> רֵיקָ֑ם <sup>7387 </sup> <n>unto me void</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> עָשָׂה֙ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>but it shall accomplish</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> חָפַ֔צְתִּי <sup>2654 </sup> <n>that which I please</n> וְהִצְלִ֖יחַ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>and it shall prosper</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שְׁלַחְתִּֽיו׃ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>[in the thing] whereto I sent</n>
12: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>with</n> בְשִׂמְחָ֣ה <sup>8057 </sup> <n>with joy</n> תֵצֵ֔אוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>For ye shall go out</n> וּבְשָׁל֖וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>with peace</n> תּֽוּבָל֑וּן <sup>2986 </sup> <n>and be led forth</n> הֶהָרִ֣ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>the mountains</n> וְהַגְּבָע֗וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and the hills</n> יִפְצְח֤וּ <sup>6476 </sup> <n>shall break forth</n> לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> רִנָּ֔ה <sup>7440 </sup> <n>you into singing</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> עֲצֵ֥י <sup>6086 </sup> <n>and all the trees</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of the field</n> יִמְחֲאוּ־ <sup>4222 </sup> <n>shall clap</n> כָֽף׃ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>[their] hands</n>
